com.betabot.script.api

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betabot.script.api.MethodProvider
      • com.betabot.script.api.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends MethodProvider
    Context menu related operations.

    • Method Detail

      • doAction

        public boolean doAction(java.lang.String action)
        Clicks the menu option. Will left-click if the menu item is the first, otherwise open menu and click the option.
        Parameters:
        action - The action (or action substring) to click.
        Returns:
        true if the menu item was clicked; otherwise false.

      • doAction

        public boolean doAction(java.lang.String action,
               java.lang.String option)
        Clicks the menu option. Will left-click if the menu item is the first, otherwise open menu and click the option.
        Parameters:
        action - The action (or action substring) to click.
        option - The option (or option substring) of the action to click.
        Returns:
        true if the menu item was clicked; otherwise false.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String action)
        Checks whether or not a given action (or action substring) is present in the menu.
        Parameters:
        action - The action or action substring.
        Returns:
        true if present, otherwise false.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String action,
               java.lang.String option)
        Checks whether or not a given action with given option is present in the menu.
        Parameters:
        action - The action or action substring.
        option - The option or option substring.
        Returns:
        true if present, otherwise false.

      • itemHasAction

        public boolean itemHasAction(RSItem item,
                    java.lang.String action)
        Determines if the item contains the desired action.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check.
        action - The item menu action to check.
        Returns:
        true if the item has the action; otherwise false.

      • clickIndex

        public boolean clickIndex(int i)
        Left clicks at the given index.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the item.
        Returns:
        true if the mouse was clicked; otherwise false.

      • getActions

        public java.lang.String[] getActions()
        Returns an array of the first parts of each item in the current menu context.
        Returns:
        The first half. "Walk here", "Trade with", "Follow".

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(java.lang.String action)
        Returns the index in the menu for a given action. Starts at 0.
        Parameters:
        action - The action that you want the index of.
        Returns:
        The index of the given option in the context menu; otherwise -1.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(java.lang.String action,
           java.lang.String option)
        Returns the index in the menu for a given action with a given option. Starts at 0.
        Parameters:
        action - The action of the menu entry of which you want the index.
        option - The option of the menu entry of which you want the index. If option is null, operates like getIndex(String action).
        Returns:
        The index of the given option in the context menu; otherwise -1.

      • getItems

        public java.lang.String[] getItems()
        Returns an array of each item in the current menu context.
        Returns:
        First half + second half. As displayed in RuneScape.

      • getLocation

        public java.awt.Point getLocation()
        Returns the menu's location.
        Returns:
        The screen space point if the menu is open; otherwise null.

      • getOptions

        public java.lang.String[] getOptions()
        Returns an array of the second parts of each item in the current menu context.
        Returns:
        The second half. "".

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the menu's item count.
        Returns:
        The menu size.

      • getSubMenuLocation

        public java.awt.Point getSubMenuLocation()
        Returns the submenu's location.
        Returns:
        The screen space point of the submenu if the menu is collapsed; otherwise null.

      • isCollapsed

        public boolean isCollapsed()
        Checks whether or not the menu is collapsed.
        Returns:
        true if the menu is collapsed; otherwise false.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Checks whether or not the menu is open.
        Returns:
        true if the menu is open; otherwise false.

      • setupListener

        public void setupListener()
        For internal use only: sets up the menuListener.
